meanings.definition: The quality or state of being soft and easily compressed.
meanings.sent1: The squashiness of the pillow made it perfect for a cozy nap.
meanings.sent2: I love the squashiness of fresh bread right out of the oven.
meanings.sent3: The squashiness of the marshmallow made it impossible to resist roasting it over the campfire.
meanings.sent4: Her hug had a warm squashiness that enveloped me like a soft blanket.
meanings.sent5: The squashiness of the ripe peach was a delight to bite into.

meanings.definition: The act of crushing or squeezing something.
meanings.sent1: The squashiness of the grapes underfoot signaled the start of winemaking season.
meanings.sent2: He demonstrated the squashiness of the stress ball by squeezing it tightly in his hand.
meanings.sent3: The squashiness of the playdough made it irresistible for the kids to mold and shape.
meanings.sent4: The squashiness of the sponge absorbed all the spilled water in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The squashiness of the mud made it difficult for the hikers to move forward.
